title: Spark City
description:
An alternate cover edition of this ASIN can be found here.His name was Magnus.He once conquered the Four Factions.  He brought the world to its knees, annihilating all who opposed him. Even in retirement, they still fear his army’s march. But this is not his tale, for he is the past.His name is Erroh.He is nothing like his warmonger father. He is happier gambling, drinking and wandering the wastes, escaping the shadow cast by his legendary family. But fate has other plans for him, for he is the present.He doesn’t know her name yet.She is a warrior destined for greatness and heartbreak. She’s never belonged in the city of light. Every step in her life has been a struggle. This next step will bring them both towards war, for she is the future.
Spark City is a heart wrenching fantasy adventure that will leave you craving more. Perfect for fans of Joe Abercrombie and David Gemmell, prepare to be swept away by Robert J Power's masterful storytelling as you join Erroh on a quest that will test his every strength in a world teetering on the brink of war.
